items.title: install ventoy
items.summary: install ventoy Ventoy is an open-source tool for creating bootable USB drives, and its main function is to assist us in installing the system. Advantages: The software is compact, with a Windows version of less than 15MB and a Linux version of 18MB, which is much smaller than the traditional WINPE with hundreds of MB. Compared to traditional PE, deployment is faster,. Installing the system is simple and effortless. Copy the Windows or Linux image directly to the USB drive in advance, and then boot from the USB drive to provide you with a selectable system list option. Click on which system you want to install.
items.content_html:
install ventoy

Ventoy is an open-source tool for creating bootable USB drives, and its main function is to assist us in installing the system. Advantages: The software is compact, with a Windows version of less than 15MB and a Linux version of 18MB, which is much smaller than the traditional WINPE with hundreds of MB. Compared to traditional PE, deployment is faster,. Installing the system is simple and effortless. Copy the Windows or Linux image directly to the USB drive in advance, and then boot from the USB drive to provide you with a selectable system list option. Click on which system you want to install.

step1 download

step2 choose system

step3 unzip

step4 start(double click)

step5 choose disk and click install

step6 finish

step7 put iso to ventoy disk

Tips

modify the first startup entry of the bios

step8 boot then you can see link this

items.title: Disabling layout and features
items.summary: You can disable some function and layout on the page by setting the Frontmatter of the page.
items.content_html:
You can disable some function and layout on the page by setting the Frontmatter of the page.

This page is an demo that disables the following features:

  • Navbar
  • Sidebar
  • Breadcrumb
  • Page information
  • Contributors
  • Edit link
  • Update time
  • Prev/Next link
  • Comment
  • Footer
  • Back to top button

items.title: Markdown Enhance
items.summary: VuePress basically generate pages from Markdown files. So you can use it to generate documentation or blog sites easily. You should create and write Markdown files, so that VuePress can convert them to different pages according to file structure.
items.content_html:
VuePress basically generate pages from Markdown files. So you can use it to generate documentation or blog sites easily.

You should create and write Markdown files, so that VuePress can convert them to different pages according to file structure.

Markdown Introduction

If you are a new learner and donâ€™t know how to write Markdown, please read Markdown Intro and Markdown Demo.

Markdown Config

VuePress introduce configuration for each Markdown page using Frontmatter.

Info

Frontmatter is a important concept in VuePress. If you donâ€™t know it, you need to read Frontmatter Introduction.

Markdown Extension

The Markdown content in VuePress will be parsed by markdown-it, which supports syntax extensions via markdown-it plugins.

VuePress Enhancement

To enrich document writing, VuePress has extended Markdown syntax.

For these extensions, please read Markdown extensions in VuePress.

Theme Enhancement

By using vuepress-plugin-md-enhance, the theme extends more Markdown syntax and provides richer writing functions.

Custom Container

Safely use {{ variable }} in Markdown.

Custom Title

A custom information container with code, link.

Custom Title

A custom tip container

Custom Title

A custom warning container

Custom Title

A custom danger container

Custom Title

A custom details container

items.title: Page Config
items.summary: Content before more comment is regarded as page excerpt.
items.content_html:
Content before more comment is regarded as page excerpt.

Page Information

You can set page information in Markdownâ€™s Frontmatter.

  • The author is Ms.Hope.
  • The writing date is January 1, 2020
  • Category is "Guide"
  • Tags are "Page Config" and "Guide"

Page Content

You are free to write your Markdown here.

Assets

  • You can place images besides your Markdown files, but you should use relative links (i.e.: starting with ./) for them.

  • For images in .vuepress/public directory, please use absolute links (i.e.: starting with /) for them.

The theme contains a custom badge:

A dark blue badge text badge at the end of line.

Page Structure

This page should contain:

  • BreadCrumb
  • Title and information
  • TOC (Table of Contents)
  • Meta information including update time and contributors
  • Comments
  • Navbar
  • Sidebar
  • Footer
  • Back to top button

You can customize them in theme options and page frontmatter.
